definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: By no means are BlackBerry phones unpopular.
BlackBerry has forty-six million users worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 黑莓手機在全球有4600萬用戶。

sentences.english: I would also like to avoid having to launch the Blackberry simulator if possible.
sentences.chinese: 我也想避免如果可能推出黑莓手機模擬器。

sentences.english: In fact, the venerable BlackBerry is currently in a “tweener” stage.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，久負盛名的黑莓目前處在了“中間”階段。

sentences.english: Preliminary study on stability of bramble pigment;
sentences.chinese: 對黑莓幹酒釀造工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: And our vivacious, playful Cassis Rose fragrance just radiates bliss.
sentences.chinese: 活潑可人的黑莓玫瑰香氛散發着無比快活的氣息。

sentences.english: They now have cameras, full Web browsers, qwerty keyboards and touch-screens.
sentences.chinese: 如今，黑莓的手機擁有全鍵盤攝像頭以及觸摸屏。

sentences.english: Pour Bourbon, Bols Blackberry and champagne in that order and stir once.
sentences.chinese: 按順序倒波本酒，波士黑莓和香檳入杯，攪合。

sentences.english: No waking me up when you come in at night using your BlackBerry as a flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 別半夜進屋把黑莓手機當手電筒使把我弄醒。

sentences.english: Blueberries are a favorite of many people, but blackberries and raspberries are also great choices.
sentences.chinese: 藍莓是許多人的最愛，而黑莓和樹莓也是不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: He fumbles in his hoodie pockets and finds his BlackBerry.
sentences.chinese: 他摸索着自己的上衣兜並發現了他的黑莓。

sentences.english: Morus having edible fruit that resembles the blackberry.
sentences.chinese: 桑屬植物，果實可食，類似於黑莓。

sentences.english: Google mobile phone an Zhuo 's loyalty is 60%, while only 48% of blackberry.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌安卓手機的忠誠度爲60%，而黑莓只有48%。

sentences.english: There are both traditional BlackBerrys with a small keyboard and touch-screen BlackBerrys.
sentences.chinese: 黑莓手機分成傳全鍵盤和觸摸屏兩種。

sentences.english: But they are still using it as a carrot to buy BlackBerry devices.
sentences.chinese: 但他們仍在將其作爲刺激黑莓設備銷售的激勵手段。

sentences.english: Ruby with great intensity. Expressive smell of cherry, prune, blackberry, raspberry, peony and mousse.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的紅寶石色，有櫻桃，黑莓和牡丹等香氣。

definition: Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)

three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Google, Internet company and search engine
